Hero.title: Find farms and wineries that fit your style.

About.intro: For those seeking a property and an exceptional life,
About.highlight: there is no better option than Valle de Uco Real State.
About.mission: Backed by years of experience and with the mission to renew the way of investing in Mendoza, Rodrigo Juri, licensed real estate broker, makes a difference for his clients at every step of the way.

History.title: Our story
History.paragraph1: The only network specialized in wineries and farms in Mendoza that interprets the new lifestyle of those seeking to invest and enjoy. Inspired by an innovative spirit and years of market experience, Rodrigo Juri, licensed real estate broker, leads a differential proposal focused on productive properties, recreation and investment projects with high potential.
History.paragraph2: Beyond the mountain views, vineyards and unique properties of the area, the goal is to offer you a lifestyle tailored to your needs: whether you are looking for an operating winery, a farm for an agricultural, tourism, wine project, a strategic investment or simply a refuge surrounded by nature.
History.paragraph3: With a selection of wineries and farms for sale in Mendoza, you can find, through Rodrigo Juri's advice, the ideal property for your project or investment, no matter where in the world you are.

Contact.title: Connect with us
Contact.description: Our team of experts is ready to help you find the perfect property or sell your property at the best market price.

Footer.description: Specialists in premium wineries and farms in Mendoza. Personalized advice to find your ideal investment.
Footer.copyright: Valle de Uco Real State. All rights reserved.

contact.title: Start today
contact.description: Receive personalized advice to find the ideal property in Mendoza, according to your project: operating winery, agricultural, tourism, wine farm, investment or to enjoy with family.

form.title: Start today
form.description: Access a professional appraisal and a sales strategy specially designed for wineries and farms in Mendoza, to get the best value for your property.

statistics.title: Unmatched market reach
statistics.description: Your property deserves maximum exposure. My platform combines online and offline channels to reach qualified buyers and investors in Mendoza, Argentina and abroad.
statistics.stat1Description: Own network and strategic alliances in the agricultural and wine sector.
statistics.stat2Description: Active owners and buyers interested in Mendoza and surrounding areas.
statistics.stat3Description: Specialization in wine, rural, productive and investment properties.

marketing.title: Comprehensive marketing strategy for your property
marketing.description: I use specific marketing tools to highlight the productive, tourism and investment value of each property and connect it with the right buyer.
marketing.card1Description: Campaigns on real estate portals, social media and databases of investors interested in Mendoza.
marketing.card2Description: Digital brochures, technical information, maps and clear production data to facilitate investment decisions.
marketing.card3Description: Connection with wineries, developers, producers and national and international investors interested in the area.
marketing.card4Description: Images, video and aerial drone shots to show the potential of the property, its views and production.

whyChoose.title: Why property owners choose Rodrigo Juri
whyChoose.description: Owners of wineries and farms in Mendoza trust a specialized advisor to sell safely, at the best value and with a clear process from start to finish.
whyChoose.stat1Description: Most owners value transparency, personalized treatment and follow-up throughout the sale.
whyChoose.stat2Description: Professional negotiation to approach the expected price, taking care of both economic value and operation conditions.
whyChoose.stat3Description: Price and marketing strategy focused on real buyers and investors, not just simple inquiries.
